title: [SciPy]: Segmentation Fault (Core dumped)

labels.name: SciPy
labels.description: issues related to enable LFortran to compile the entire FORTRAN codebase in SciPy

body:
File : ```scipy/special/amos/zuni2.f```
, ```scipy/special/amos/zbknu.f```
, ```scipy/special/amos/zunk2.f```
, ```scipy/special/amos/zunhj.f```
, ```scipy/special/amos/dgamln.f```
, ```scipy/special/amos/zunik.f```
, ```scipy/special/cdflib/ipmpar.f```
, ```scipy/special/cdflib/erf.f```
, ```scipy/special/cdflib/alngam.f```
, ```scipy/special/cdflib/gratio.f```
, ```scipy/special/cdflib/gamma_fort.f```
, ```scipy/special/cdflib/gaminv.f``` and many more files

Results segmentation fault, as shown below

```
(lf) pranavchiku@pranavchiku-Yoga-Slim-7-14IIL05:~/lfortran$ ./src/bin/lfortran --no-warnings --fixed-form --implicit-typing --allow-implicit-interface --show-asr /home/pranavchiku/scipy/scipy/special/amos/zuni2.f
Segmentation fault (core dumped)
```
